Text:
Thank you for sharing this--you see to be the new "go-to" source for those of us who like to watch Mr. Feguson but, for whatever reason, cannot do so.

I used to get this from web lockers, but it isn't available lately.  Seems most things aren't available lately as they were--is this whole mega-surveillance world society thing cramping everyone's p2p style?  I should hope not.

Thanks BYTE.

xminus1, I attribute the change of u/l pace to Summer vacation...  that's my guess at least.
